title: Acting true to form: Cashing in on the dead, JVP’s creed – Minister Dilan Perera
content: “From the beginning, the JVP got a person killed and then sold his body and blood stained clothes to gain political advantage. This time a garment worker became their victim. The police blindly assisted the JVP to kill this person,” Foreign Employment and Welfare Minister Dilan Perera said….
